subject: Basketball
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: LeBron James, Chris Paul, Dwyane Wade and Carmelo Anthony are organizing a four-game Homecoming Tour, with games in Akron, New Orleans, Chicago and East Rutherford, N.J.
snippet: LeBron James, Chris Paul, Dwyane Wade and Carmelo Anthony are organizing a four-game Homecoming Tour, with games in Akron, New Orleans, Chicago and East Rutherford, N.J.
